column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " I ca n't believe we did n't find anything . "
#Text=Lin says : " It would appear Hiroshi is innocent . "
#Text=Asami says : " Okay , you did your search .
#Text=" Mako says : " So , I hope you 're convinced now .
#Text=" Korra says : " No , I 'm not !
#Text=I do n't care how cooperative Hiroshi is being , I know he 's lying .
#Text=" Mako says : " Why are you doing this ?
#Text=Are you that jealous of me and Asami ?
#Text=" Korra says : " What ?
#Text=Do n't be ridiculous !
#Text=That has nothing to do with it !
#Text=" Mako says : " If you do n't drop this , consider our friendship over .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm sorry .
#Text=Hiroshi is not the man you think he is .
#Text=" Mako says : " Hmph .
#Text=" Korra says : " I think you guys should hear this .
#Text=" If you want to find the truth , meet me under the north end of the Silk Road Bridge at midnight . "
#Text="
